Articles.Content: I've had tons of problems with how it works. Sometimes it keeps switching by itself to either radial or mirror regardless what I'm currently building in or have built the previous parts in. Its just buggy.

Yes, sometimes the only solution is to replace the "infected" part with a fresh one. And sometimes the editor stays fixed on mirror when you want single. The option is to switch to radial and back.

Funny thing is ... it's like the code from Editor Extensions was copied into the game, because it's a very old bug from EE.

Well, if you're not averse to mods, this may interest you somewhat. It's not perfect, but it does fix some of the radial/mirror issues as well as just the radial ones.
